alert.note: Alert for Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley; Imperial County Southeast; Joshua Tree NP East; Joshua Tree NP West; Palo Verde Valley; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 12:47PM PST until January 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MST /6 PM PST/ SUNDAY TO 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arizona and southeast and southern California. * WHEN...From 7 PM MST /6 PM PST/ Sunday to 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions due to crosswinds and pockets of blowing dust. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley; Imperial County Southeast; Joshua Tree NP East; Joshua Tree NP West; Palo Verde Valley; Salton Sea
